org.cougaar.core.domain
Interface RootPlan

All Superinterfaces:
BlackboardServesDomain, Service, XPlan
All Known Implementing Classes:
RootPlanImpl
public interface RootPlan
extends BlackboardServesDomain, XPlan, Service

The "root" plan provides blackboard access to Domain LogicProviders, including a view of all UniqueObjects on the blackboard.

This is the interface that most domains use to access the blackboard.
